00025 #define MAXNG 3
00026 
00027 void mirrorSlaterDet(SlaterDet* Q)
00028 {
00029   int i;
00030   int Z=Q->Z; int N=Q->N;
00031 
00032   Q->Z=N; Q->N=Z;
00033 
00034   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++)
00035     Q->G[i].xi *= -1;
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 void doublegaussianSlaterDet(const SlaterDet* Q, SlaterDet* Qp, int trafo)
00040 {
00041   int i,j;
00042 
00043   assert(2*Q->ngauss <= MAXNG*Q->A);
00044 
00045   Qp->A = Q->A; Qp->Z = Q->Z; Qp->N = Q->N;
00046   Qp->ngauss = 2*Q->ngauss;
00047   Qp->idx = (int*) malloc(Qp->A*sizeof(int));
00048   Qp->ng = (int*) malloc(Qp->A*sizeof(int));
00049   Qp->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(MAXNG*Qp->A*sizeof(Gaussian));
00050 
00051   for (i=0; i<Q->A; i++) {
00052     Qp->idx[i] = 2*Q->idx[i];
00053     Qp->ng[i] = 2*Q->ng[i];
00054   }
00055   for (i=0; i<2*Q->ngauss; i++)
00056     Qp->G[i] = Q->G[i/2];
00057   
00058 
00059   // polarization of gaussians
00060   if (trafo == 0) {
00061     for (i=1; i<2*Q->ngauss; i=i+2) {
00062       for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00063         Qp->G[i].b[j] += 0.5*((double) rand()/RAND_MAX);
00064       Qp->G[i].chi[0] += 0.1*((double) rand()/RAND_MAX);
00065       Qp->G[i].chi[1] *= 0.1*((double) rand()/RAND_MAX);  
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069   // haloize gaussians 
00070   if (trafo == 1) {
00071     for (i=1; i<2*Q->ngauss; i=i+2) {
00072       Qp->G[i].a += 2.0;
00073       Qp->G[i].chi[0] *= 0.1;
00074       Qp->G[i].chi[1] *= 0.1;
00075     }
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 void doublegaussianSlaterDetParity(const SlaterDet* Q, SlaterDet* Qp, int par)
00081 {
00082   int i;
00083 
00084   assert(2*Q->ngauss <= MAXNG*Q->A);
00085 
00086   Qp->A = Q->A; Qp->Z = Q->Z; Qp->N = Q->N;
00087   Qp->ngauss = 2*Q->ngauss;
00088   Qp->idx = (int*) malloc(Qp->A*sizeof(int));
00089   Qp->ng = (int*) malloc(Qp->A*sizeof(int));
00090   Qp->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(MAXNG*Qp->A*sizeof(Gaussian));
00091 
00092   for (i=0; i<Q->A; i++) {
00093     Qp->idx[i] = 2*Q->idx[i];
00094     Qp->ng[i] = 2*Q->ng[i];
00095   }
00096   for (i=0; i<Q->ngauss; i++) {
00097     Qp->G[0+2*i] = Q->G[i];
00098     Qp->G[1+2*i] = Q->G[i]; invertGaussian(&Qp->G[1+2*i]);
00099     if (par == -1) {
00100       Qp->G[1+2*i].chi[0] *= -1;
00101       Qp->G[1+2*i].chi[1] *= -1;
00102     }
00103   }
00104 }

00108 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00109 {
00110   createinfo(argc, argv);
00111 
00112   int mirror=0;
00113   int doublegauss=0;
00114   int doubleparity=0;
00115   int halo=0;
00116   int invert=0;
00117   double scale=0.0;
00118   int flip=-1;
00119   char c;
00120   
00121   if (argc < 3) {
00122     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] slaterdetfile fmdparafile\n"
00123             "\n   -m         mirror nucleus"
00124             "\n   -p         apply parity operator"
00125             "\n   -d         double the number of gaussians"
00126             "\n   -P PAR     double the number of gaussians, second Gaussian is parity partner"
00127             "\n   -h         double and haloize"
00128             "\n   -s SCALE   scale dimensions in Slater determinant\n",
00129             argv[0]);
00130     exit(-1);
00131   }
00132   
00133   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "mf:pdhs:P:")) != -1)
00134     switch (c) {
00135     case 'm':
00136       mirror=1;
00137       break;
00138     case 'f':
00139       flip = atoi(optarg);
00140       break;
00141     case 'p':
00142       invert=1;
00143       break;
00144     case 'd':
00145       doublegauss=1;
00146       break;
00147     case 'h':
00148       doublegauss=1;
00149       halo=1;
00150       break;
00151     case 'P':
00152       doubleparity=atoi(optarg);
00153       break;
00154     case 's':
00155       scale = atof(optarg);
00156       break;
00157     }
00158 
00159   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00160   char* fmdparafile = argv[optind+1];
00161 
00162   SlaterDet sldet;
00163   readSlaterDetfromFile(&sldet, slaterdetfile);
00164 
00165   if (mirror)
00166     mirrorSlaterDet(&sldet);
00167 
00168   if (flip != -1) {
00169     int i;
00170     for (i=0; i<sldet.ng[flip]; i++)
00171       spinflipGaussian(&sldet.G[sldet.idx[flip]+i]);
00172   }
00173 
00174   if (doublegauss) {
00175     SlaterDet sldetd;
00176     
00177     // squeeze by default
00178     doublegaussianSlaterDet(&sldet, &sldetd, halo);
00179     copySlaterDet(&sldetd, &sldet);
00180   }
00181 
00182   if (doubleparity) {
00183     SlaterDet sldetd;
00184 
00185     doublegaussianSlaterDetParity(&sldet, &sldetd, doubleparity);
00186     copySlaterDet(&sldetd, &sldet);
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (invert)
00190     invertSlaterDet(&sldet);
00191 
00192   if (scale != 0.0) {
00193     scaleSlaterDet(&sldet, scale);
00194   }
00195 
00196   Para fmdpara;
00197   SlaterDetinitFMD(&sldet, &fmdpara);
00198 
00199   // write FMD parameters to file
00200   
00201   FILE* parafp;
00202 
00203   
00204   if (!(parafp = fopen(fmdparafile, "w"))) {
00205     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", fmdparafile);
00206     exit(-1);
00207   }
00208 
00209   fprintinfo(parafp);
00210 
00211   fprintf(parafp, "\n<Parameterization FMD>\n");
00212   FMDwrite(parafp, &fmdpara);
00213   fprintf(parafp, "</Parameterization FMD>\n\n");
00214 
00215   writeSlaterDet(parafp, &sldet);
00216 
00217   fclose(parafp);
00218 
00219   return 0;
00220 }
